headline.main: Republican Candidates: Drop Out? Who, Me?

docs.snippet: Mitt Romney's biggest asset as he attempts to close out the 2012 Republican presidential nomination may his rivals' reluctance to leave the race....

headline.main: Republican Candidates: Drop Out? Who, Me?

docs.snippet: Mitt Romney's biggest asset as he attempts to close out the 2012 Republican presidential nomination may his rivals' reluctance to leave the race....
docs.abstract: Mitt Romney's biggest asset as he attempts to close out the 2012 Republican presidential nomination may his rivals' reluctance to leave the race.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney's biggest asset as he tries to wrap up the 2012 Republican presidential nomination may be the egos of his rivals.

docs.snippet: William Cohan tells us something we didn't know....
docs.abstract: William Cohan tells us something we didn't know.

docs.snippet: William Cohan tells us something we didn't know....
docs.abstract: William Cohan tells us something we didn't know.
docs.lead_paragraph: William Cohan has an interesting take on Mitt Romney, which is completely distinct from the policy and left/right issues. According to Cohan, who did deals with Bain during the Romney years, the company specialized in dirty tricks.

docs.lead_paragraph: In their 45-10 rout of the Broncos on Saturday night, the Patriots didn't pull Tom Brady late in the fourth quarter.

headline.main: Tim Tebow's Postgame Comments, and Unclear Future

headline.main: Tim Tebow's Postgame Comments, and Unclear Future

docs.snippet: The quarterback discussed the Broncos' loss against New England and his off-season plans. His future is more open-ended than many fans may realize....
docs.abstract: The quarterback discussed the Broncos' loss against New England and his off-season plans. His future is more open-ended than many fans may realize.
docs.lead_paragraph: Because Tim Tebow has transcended football, he has steadily gained casual fans and many who are barely familiar with the game. These two categories of fans may not be aware  that his  long-term future as a starting quarterback with the Denver Broncos is far from secure.

docs.snippet: Top magazine and long-form articles this week....
docs.abstract: Top magazine and long-form articles this week.

docs.snippet: Top magazine and long-form articles this week....
docs.abstract: Top magazine and long-form articles this week.
docs.lead_paragraph: In an analysis of the comparative strengths of political parties in Uttar Pradesh, Outlook magazine finds that no clear majority emerges and predicts that the state elections scheduled for February may end in a hung verdict. "In 2012, the most interesting candidate Faizabad has thrown up is a kinnar (eunuch) who plans to contest as an independent," the piece observes about the election constituency, which has been a political stronghold over the past several decades. Despite the eunuchs being a marginalized community, a local trader said, "a hijra is better than all of these useless parties," suggesting a sense of despair about the current crop of political candidates.
